summary.para: The module contained in the DevExpress.ExpressApp.Chart.Win.v15.2.dll assembly.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Chart.Win.ChartWindowsFormsModule.GetModuleUpdaters(DevExpress.ExpressApp.IObjectSpace,System.Version)

summary.para: Returns the list of updaters that handle database updates for the ChartWindowsFormsModule module.

A System.Version object which represents the current database version.

summary.para: Represents the charting List Editor used in the XAF Windows Forms applications.

summary.para: Provides access to the ChartListEditor's control.

summary.para: Performs the required pre-export actions under the ChartListEditor.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Chart.Win.ChartListEditor.Printable

summary.para: Specifies the control to be exported via the .

member.value: An IPrintable object that is the control used for exporting. The default value is the ChartListEditor's property value.

summary.para: Occurs when the ChartListEditor's controls are created and disposed of.

member.name: P:DevExpress.ExpressApp.Chart.Win.ChartListEditor.SupportedExportFormats

summary.para: Provides access to the list of export formats supported by the current Chart List Editor.

summary.para: Determines whether or not the given data access mode is supported by the ChartListEditor.
